name: Active Maintenance Contracts
query:
SELECT 
    e.contract_title AS "Contract Title", 
    e.customer_name AS "Customer Name", 
    e.contract_type AS "Contract Type", 
    e.supervisor AS "Supervisor", 
    e.contract_start_date AS "Start Date",
    e.contract_end_date AS "End Date", 
    e.total_contract_value AS "Total Contract Value", 
    e.total_invoiced_amount AS "Total Invoice Amount", 
    e.status AS "Status"
FROM 
    `tabProject Maintenance Contract` AS e
WHERE
    e.contract_type = %(contracttype)s
    AND e.status = %(status)s
    AND e.contract_start_date >= %(start_date)s
    AND e.contract_end_date <= %(end_date)s
